channel.title: Posts on Ora600 — Personal site of Pavel Popov

item.title: Starting New Site, again
item.description:
Hey there, I decided to start new site using Hugo for site generation. It seems like more flexible and way more quicker then Jekyll.

So let’s have fun and design some theme first.

I desided to base my theme on famous motherfuckingwebsite.com, actually on it’s better version.

There is a comprehensive documentation about how to use Hugo, I get through it, it’s just awesome.
